page_description: A selection of my best works

projects.name: Circuito1App
projects.description: C1A (CircuitoUnoApp) is a web application built as a PWA, which goal is to record and track the flow of voters in five local governments of the Sucre State during the venezuelan parlamentary elections (2020).

projects.name: SAI Frontend
projects.description: SAI is a web application designed to streamline and enhance the management of social care services. It provides statistics and charts of attendances for informed decision-making and resource allocation.
